00033 host_info::host_info(string plugin_id,
00034                      map<string,string> properties)
00035 {
00036     // Customize if needed
00037     if(!initialize_plugin(properties))
00038         throw runtime_error("cpu plugin could not be initialized");
00039

00047 host_info::~host_info(void)
00048 {
00049     // Customize if needed
00050     sigar_close(sig_);
00051 
00052 }

00060 bool host_info::initialize_plugin(map<string,string> properties) 
00061 {
00062     // Customize if needed
00063     sigar_open(&sig_);
00064 
00065     sigar_net_info_t net_info;
00066     sigar_net_info_get(sig_, &net_info);
00067     
00068     strcpy(hostname_,net_info.host_name);
00069     
00070     return true;
00071 }
00072 
00084 bool host_info::generate_and_publish_information(DDSDynamicDataWriter *writer,
00085                                            DDS_DynamicData *data)
00086 {
00087     
00088     data->set_string("hostname",
00089                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00090                      hostname_);
00091     
00092     //SYS_INFO---------------------------------------------
00093     sigar_sys_info_get(sig_,&sysinfo_);
00094     
00095     data->set_string("sys_name",
00096                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00097                      sysinfo_.name);
00098 
00099     data->set_string("sys_version",
00100                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00101                      sysinfo_.version);
00102 
00103     data->set_string("sys_arch",
00104                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00105                      sysinfo_.arch);
00106 
00107     data->set_string("sys_description",
00108                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00109                      sysinfo_.description);
00110              
00111     //UPTIME-----------------------------------------------
00112     sigar_uptime_get(sig_,&uptime_);
00113 
00114     data->set_double("uptime",
00115                      DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00116                      uptime_.uptime);
00117                      
00118     //Timestamp (time_t)
00119     timestamp_ = time(NULL);
00120     data->set_long("ts",
00121                    DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_MEMBER_ID_UNSPECIFIED,
00122                    timestamp_);
00123     
00124     // Then let the base class do the job of publising-----------------------------
00125     if(!publish_information(writer, data))
00126         return false;
00127 
00128     return true;
00129 
00130 }
